body: n i g g e r

This work is too short but that is expected as the protagonist is not an African-American male. You see it is my firm belief that privilege millennial males such as myself has a duty to share what we gained from institutionalized racism that our forefathers created. America as founded on the backs of the ancestors of the current generation of African-American males. Their ancestors were forced to work on the fields or in the mines for little to no pay. The cards have been stacked against them for generations and now society treats them worst than before. Some of them were put in jail for minor crimes. At the same time, the rich are able to walk free. That is why I propose that we visit the prisons and let these poor men release some steam and make sweet love to our significant others. If you never had a partner before than bring your mothers or sisters. You will be filled with happiness knowing that you did the right thing as you see them form the beast with two backs before your eyes.
